text: It was an emotional night on “ America ’ s Got Talent ” as Evie Clair returned to the show after the death of her father Amos Abplanalp. Amos, 42, died Sept. 7 after a battle with cancer. On Tuesday, the 13 - year - old honored her dad with a pre - taped package where she reflected on the lessons she learned from him. ` ` My dad was one of the bravest people I knew, ” she said. “ He always taught us to follow our dreams.'' Clair said that it was Amos that helped her find the strength to carry on, ` ` My dad taught me, after I started something, to always finish it.
